did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Educators and Librarians Collection,

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: Stanford University. Libraries. Dept. of Special Collections and University Archives.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights:
userestrict.p: Property rights reside with the repository. Literary rights reside with the creators of the documents or their heirs. To obtain permission to publish or reproduce, please contact the Public Services Librarian of the Dept. of Special Collections.

custodhist.head: Provenance:
custodhist.p: Received from various gifts and purchases.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation:
prefercite.p: [Identification of item] Educators and Librarians Collection, M130, Dept. of Special Collections, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

scopecontent.head: SCOPE AND CONTENT
scopecontent.p: This collection includes letters, postcards, bills, and clippings, representing persons in the fields of education and librarianship. Of note are the 181 items pertaining to William James, including 164 letters from James to F. C. S. Schiller discussing pragmatism, humanism, and personal matters.
